synopsis.text:
Adepts, individuals endowed with extraordinary abilities known as Septimal Powers, have emerged in a not-so-distant future. These powers range from flight and energy manipulation to elemental control, setting the stage for chaos and disorder. In Japan, the Sumeragi Group, a seemingly benign conglomerate, claims to maintain peace and order. However, beneath this facade lies a dark truth: the Sumeragi Group captures Adepts, subjecting them to cruel experiments and sacrifices to preserve the nation's tranquility.

Enter Gunvolt, a powerful Adept with the ability to generate electrical fields. As a member of QUILL, an organization dedicated to exposing the Sumeragi Group's nefarious activities, Gunvolt embarks on a mission to infiltrate one of their facilities. His journey takes a turn when he encounters Sian, a mysterious heroine.

Once a member of Feather, a resistance group fighting against the Sumeragi Group, Gunvolt now stands at the forefront of the battle for freedom and justice for his fellow Adepts. Will he succeed in unveiling the truth and liberating his fellow Adepts from the clutches of the Sumeragi Group? Only time will tell in this thrilling, action-packed anime.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
